p: The synthesized polyols were used to prepare several PU formulations with enhanced surface hydrophilicity and antimicrobial properties after aminolysis with poly(propylene glycol) monoamine (Jeffamine Â® M-600) and complexation with iodine. The antibacterial activity of these systems was tested against P. aeruginosa, S. aureus, and C. albicans [ 320], where effectiveness was only observed for Gram-positive bacteria and fungi but not for Gram-negative bacteria.
